healthIndex.healthIndexTooltip: The safety of your loan derived from the proportion of collateral versus amount borrowed. Keep it above 1 to avoid liquidation.
healthIndex.usedBorrowingPowerTooltip: The percentage of the maximum borrowing power you are currently using
healthIndex.LTVTooltip: Loan-to-Value represents the maximum borrowing power of your collateral. For example, with a LTV of 75%, you can borrow up to 0.75 worth of ETH in mexican pesos for every 1 ETH worth of collateral.
healthIndex.currentETHPriceTooltip: The current price of collateral, as priced by the protocol
healthIndex.liquidationETHPriceTooltip: The price at which your collateral will be liquidated to cover your debt
healthIndex.collateralValueTooltip: The current value of your deposited collateral, converted to mexican pesos
healthIndex.maxDebtTooltip: Your maximum allowed debt, taking into account the current value of your collateral

modal.body: Please select below, or connect manually to one of the following networks
